modName: Delaney of the Pure Heart follower
summary: First try at adding a follower NPC to Skyrim, this one being modeled after my girlfriend.
descriptionHtml:
My first try at using the Creation Kit, adding my girlfriend as a marriageable and follower candidate.

Features: 
class: spellsword (beta), assassin (alpha)
light foot perk among a few others
carries blades armor, daedric gauntlets, muffled glass boots, ebony shield, delvins thieves guild armor set, blades sword, daedric arrow
knows fast healing, healing hands, summon dragon priest

1.1 Beta: fixed placement, can be found outside in Whiterun
Fixed custom hair issues
fixed combat style to Spellsword/class Spellsword
no bugs as is
(if you cant find her try the detect life or aura whisper, thats how i found her)
removed marriage option till next update/test

1.0 Beta: fixed most aesthetic issues and customized hair
 bugs: does not appear in world and must be consoled using help and player.placeatme
 still have not tested marriage
 uses apachiiskyhair (bugged??? let me know)

Alpha: Working on fixing aesthetic issues
 appears in world at Talos Shrine in Whiterun
 works as follower
 have not tested marriage yet

Planned: 
custom voice (major update and will take time)
custom emotions
?tweak face to be more accurate?
?maybe a quest?

Any suggestions to make her better or a request is welcome!
Be sure to tell me any bugs you find!

removal:
leave follower
exit game
remove files
profit

More mods by me
Nikandros the Fallen: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18251
Dragkol Dragonpriest: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18199
author: pokemoneg
